# cmp-image



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute       | Description                                                           | Type     | Default            |
| ------------------ | --------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------------------ |
| `alt` _(required)_ | `alt`           | Alt Text for the Image                                                | `string` | `undefined`        |
| `imgDirectory`     | `img-directory` | Image directory.                                                      | `string` | `'assets/images/'` |
| `largePxl`         | `large-pxl`     | Transition to Large Screen Size.                                      | `number` | `1440`             |
| `largeSrc`         | `large-src`     | Responsive Full resolution image                                      | `string` | `undefined`        |
| `mediumPxl`        | `medium-pxl`    | Transition to Medium Screen Size.                                     | `number` | `959`              |
| `mediumSrc`        | `medium-src`    | Responsive Medium sized image to be displayed on tablet sized screens | `string` | `undefined`        |
| `smallPxl`         | `small-pxl`     | Transition to Small Screen Size.                                      | `number` | `524`              |
| `smallSrc`         | `small-src`     | Responsive Small image to be displayed on phone sized screens         | `string` | `undefined`        |
| `src` _(required)_ | `src`           | Name of the image to display                                          | `string` | `undefined`        |
